import './App.css'; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [text, setText] = useState(""); const [list, setList] = useState([]); const [checked,setChecked] =useState(false); const onClick = ((e) => { e.preventDefault(); setList([...list,text]); setText(""); }) const onChangeInput = ((e) => { setText(e.target.value); }) const handleChange = (()=>{ const a =e.target.value; if(a=="on"){ e.target.parentElement.parentElement.classList="completed"; } setChecked(!checked); }) return (
